description:
This video started off with just Logan and Bralin, but Jude and Logan had spent the day earlier surfing (why didn't I notice their dirty feet?!). They came right from the beach together. So Jude showed up ready to go, so I thought, why not?
I think it is safe to say that it was Bralin's first time with two dudes, and he was completely turned on.
Jude and Logan have worked together before, since that they have become friends outside of adult work, so it was a little awkward for them to find themselves getting it on again.
Though, Logan laughed beforehand that he was going to fuck the shit out of Jude, something about Jude owing him some money! But I think Logan learned you just can't fuck Jude hard enough!
Not a bad cumshot as Jude soaks himself, with Bralin and Logan adding their spunk afterwards!
Enjoy!
title: Bralin & Jude & Logan Huston - TagTeam
